name: crtr
body:
/******************************************************************************************\

Object Name : TInsUpdDel_$TableName$
Object Type : TRIGGER
Created By  : $AUTHOR$
Created Date: $DATE(dd MMM yyyy)$
Approved By :
Description : $DESCRIPTION$
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changes History:
================
Changed By  :

Approved By : 
Description : 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Changed By  : 
Changed Date:

Description : 
\******************************************************************************************/
CREATE OR ALTER TRIGGER $SchemaName$.TInsUpdDel_$TableName$
ON $SchemaName$.$TableName$
AFTER DELETE, INSERT, UPDATE
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

    $CURSOR$
END;
GO
